head.title: File:Flag of the United States (Pantone).svg - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

div.div: Full resolution‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,235 × 650 pixels, file size: 1 KB)

div.p:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

div.a: Flag of the United States of America
Flagge der Vereinigten Staaten von Amerika

a.title: es:Bandera de los Estados Unidos de América

div.a: Bandera de los Estados Unidos de América

td.div: Gaeilge: Bratach na Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá
Gaelg: Brattagh ny Steatyn Unnaneysit America
Interlingue: Flagga del Unit States de America

a.title: ja:アメリカ合衆国の国旗

div.a: Vlag van de Verenigde Staten van Amerika

td.div: Novial: Flage de Unionati States de Amerika
Nouormand: Couleu d's Êtats Unnis d'Améthique
Diné bizaad: Wááshindoon Bikéyah Ałhidadiidzooígíí bidah naatʼaʼí
Deitsch: Faahne vun die Vereenichde Schaate vun Amerikaa
Scots: Banner o the Unitit States o Americae
Gagana Samoa: Fu'a o Iunaite Sitete o Amerika
Tagalog: Watawat ng Estados Unidos ng Amerika

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.p: 11 September 2005–14 May 2008, based on the above flag law as amended by Executive Order No. 10834 dated 21 August 1959.
SVG implementation of U. S. Code: Title 4, Chapter 1, Section 1 [1] (the United States Federal “Flag Law”).

p.style: width:30em; border:2px solid #55b05a; margin:1px 0; background:#fff; color:#000;
